title: "R100" x Mameshiba Original Manners
original_name: 映画『R100』×「豆しば」オリジナルマナ
sinopse: A movie theater manners collaboration between Mameshiba and the feature film R100, which was released nationwide in Japan on October 5, 2013. The film is about a salaryman who joins a BDSM club that starts to leak into his family life--it is considered a sex drama comedy film.
